content.new: Some days ago I realized that the gazebo::physics::contactManager misses some contacts. I discovered that a model could have first a conatct being not detected by the class, and then being detected later if the user activates the view->contacts option in

issue.title: ContactManager c++ API doesn't work unless there is a subscriber to `~/physics/contacts`
